segments.text: I see the woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the cookies, and the stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the girl isn't helping to stabilize the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and it's creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman must be really tired to not notice what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn't see the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this scene is just asking for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be enjoying the thrill of sneaking a treat with her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with it or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I'm not sure if they can hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR
